sections.title: Invitation
sections.text:
### Dear Family and Friends
 as we made a brave move and decided to exchange vows and join in marriage in the presence of our loved ones, 
 #### we joyfully request the pleasure of your company. 
 ### Wedding Ceremony 
 Friday, July 22 at 5:00 in the evening 

 Tamás Tanya, Csemő, Szélmalom dűlő 2, 2713 
 ### Dinner and reception 
 Friday, July 22 at 7:00 in the evening 
 ### Arrival 
 You can arrive to the venue from 3:30 in the afternoon 
 ### Transfer to Cegléd 
 During the night there will be a minibus turning 3-4 times making sure to transfer those guests safe that wants to go to Cegléd. 
 ### [RSVP](https://forms.gle/Z1wcSqFYtgA9FUPC7) 
 Please send RSVP until May 31 (1 person per couple may fill it)

timeline.text: **This is how it began**, we met at Strand Festival at one of the counters of the festival bars, but at that time we didn't know we were meant to be each other.
**Love at Nth sight**, after not interracting for a year, we again met at the festival where we decided to give it a chance and meet again in Budapest.
**Finally girlfriend and boyfriend**, exactly on Viktor's name day after a couple of dates it was no question anymore that we should be girlfriend and boyfriend from now on.
**Engagement**, Viktor pop the big question out in Füvészkert where we always wanted to go on a date, but couldn't really get there through the years.

sections.title: Engagement Photos
sections.text: Below you can find some of our favourite moments of the engagement photo shoot.

sections.title: Info of the Venue
sections.text:
### [Tamás Tanya](https://tamastanya.hu/)
 is a huge ranch next to a forest and various fieldlands with authentic straw bales and every characteristics of the rural life. Tamás Tanya will give home to the nonsectarian, civil ceremony at 17:00 sharp in the Ceremony Garden. (pictures below) 
### Accomodation
 If you require to stay after the reception you can be accomodated in wooden cabins of maximum of 4 people. The price of one night stay is 4500 HUF / person that might be transferred ahead. 

 The next day we invite you for a lovely breakfast to dispel hangover. Rooms have to be vacated by 10:00 am the latest.

 ### Transfer to Cegléd 
 Those who wants to go and sleep in their own bed in Cegléd we provide transfer to the way back. The minibus will turn 3-4 times during the night, so to make sure everyone can get home safe.

locations.title: Train
locations.text:
**Where:** from Nyugati Railway station, to Cegléd train station

**Link:** [Elvira](https://jegy.mav.hu/?honnan=005510009&hova=005513722&idopont=202207220000&indulaserkezes=indulas&lang=en)

sections.title: Wishlist
sections.text:
We've been together a year or two, we don't really need anything new. 
 
 Yet if a gift is in your intention, we thought that we would mention, we'd love some pennies to put together, to save for something that we will treasure. 
 
 And just remember, what means the most, is that you are with us to raise a toast!

sections.title: OurWedding
sections.text: Wedding highlights video will be uploaded here. Until that...

forms.text: Please upload the best pictures you took on our wedding and share with us.

forms.title: Wedding RSVP
forms.text: In case you have the possibility to take part in our wedding, please fill the form until **May 31**!
